epic.basic

Class BasicSIRAmountManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • epic.basic.BasicSIRAmountManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    broadwick.stochastic.AmountManager

    public class BasicSIRAmountManager
extends Object
implements broadwick.stochastic.AmountManager
    BasicSIRAmountManager controls the model state in the simulation via the performEvent method the performEvent method updates the model state with the event and then also generates new events which it adds to the transition kernel this class contains the BasicSIR model
    Version:
    9 April 2014
    Author:
    Samantha Lycett

      void performEvent(broadwick.stochastic.SimulationEvent reaction, int times)
      performs the simulation event (reaction) a replicate number of times (times) this method infact asks the underlying model to perform the simulation event the replicate number of times and then updates the transition kernel with new events generated from the underlying model this is called from the simulator object in the BasicSIRModel class run method (which is the main broadwick entry point)

      • initialiseTransitionKernelWithFirstEvents

        public void initialiseTransitionKernelWithFirstEvents()
        generates the first set of events from the model and updates the transition kernel with these new events assumes that the model has been initialised with e.g. at least one infected this is called from the BasicSIRModel class init method (which is the main broadwick entry point)

      • performEvent

        public void performEvent(broadwick.stochastic.SimulationEvent reaction,
                int times)
